name: SpineMT Model K
descr:
SpineMT Model K
 
Spinal Mobilization & Decompression - Now! 3- Dimensional Decompression.
 
SpineMT is customized and multiple-functional equipment designed according to the site, type and level of the herniated disc. Features of Spine MT:
  • Mobilization
  • Unilateral Correction
  • Decompression & Correction
  • Customized 3-Dimensional Treatment
  • Gravity Traction
Contact us for more informations.
